title: Mudhan Mudhalil Paarthen Lyrics Aaha
stanzas:
mudhan mudhalil paarthen
kadhal vandhathe
enai marandhu enthan
nizhal pogudhe

enil indru naane illai
kadhal pole yedhum illai
enge endhan idhayam anbe
vandhu sernthathaa

nadhavan idhi ingethaan
naan enthan jeevanai
nerinil paarthen

nodikkoru tharam unnai
ninaikka vaithaai
adikkadi ennudal
silrkkavaithaai
mudhal paarvai nenjil
endrum uyir vazhume
uyir vazhume

eazhu swara ettaai aagadho
naan konda kadhalin
aazhathai paada

thegam engum kangal
thondraadho
nee ennai paarkaiyil
naanathai mooda

naan kanda maattram
ellaam nee thandhadhu
nee thandhadhu..

seo.description: Get the complete Mudhan Mudhalil Paarthen Lyrics Aaha from Aaha. composed by Deva and sung by Hariharan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
